title: Our Christmas Menus
itunes:title: Our Christmas Menus
description:
In this episode, Bobby and Sophie break down all of the Christmas menus that they may need for the upcoming festivities. For starters, Bobby outlines the Italian tradition for Christmas Eve called "Feast of The seven Fishes". Next, Sophie and Bobby brainstorm Christmas morning brunch ideas and they close by planning out Christmas dinner. Tune in, make a list for you and your family, and enjoy!

For more information on "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on Instagram:

Bobby Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's page: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
